Glad to have you with us. Start by setti: Glad to have you with us. Start by setting your budget.
savingsAmountNote: This amount will be deducted from income and transferred to the goal.
largeAmountWarning: Expense of :amount LYD detected; unusually high for this category. Review advised for budget compliance.
urgentAlert: Deadline approaching: :days days remaining. Daily savings of :amount LYD required to meet target.
keepGoingDaily: Current achievement: :percent%. Daily savings of :amount LYD will ensure timely completion.
keepGoing: Stable and professional performance. Sustaining this trend ensures financial security.
moderateExpense: This expense is within the normal and reasonable range.
smallExpense: A minor and appropriate expense, helps maintain the budget.
greatIncome: Wonderful! An excellent income of :amount LYD will boost your financial plans.
highSavingsRate: Superior performance analysis: Savings rate of :rate% reflects high financial discipline.
goodSavingsStart: Positive growth indicator. Reviewing non-essential expenditures is recommended to optimize efficiency.
financialDeficit: Strategic alert: Expenditures exceed income. Budget recalibration required to mitigate deficit.
budgetOverrun: Budget overrun in :count categories. Expenditure control is mandatory to meet objectives.
goalsNearCompletion: Performance proximity detected: :count goals nearing completion.
defaultIntelligenceAdvice: Consistent transaction logging enhances analytical precision and financial outcomes.
fixedExpenseDesc: Inevitable obligations like rent and bills.
xrayDescription: Precise analysis of 10 vital financial indicators using Qiratae AI algorithms.
notificationHubDesc: System alerts, AI directions, and performance reports.
budgetExceededMessage: Important alert: You exceeded the :category budget by :percent%. Please review spending immediately.
budgetUnderUsedMessage: :category budget used only :percent% with few days left. Reallocate the remainder or save it.
budgetNearLimitMessage: Warning: You have used :percent% of the :category budget. Little remains in this period.
budgetSavedMessage: Great job! The period ended and you saved more than half of :category budget. Keep it up.
budgetResetNeededMessage: The :category budget period ended. Do you want to reset for next period or adjust the limit?
goalSlowProgress: Alert: Progress on :goal is behind schedule. Increase daily saving to :needed_daily LYD to catch up.
goalUrgentDeadline: Strategic alert: Deadline for :goal is in :days days. Do you need to replan?
goalCompletedMessage: Congrats :name! You achieved the goal :goal successfully.
goalNearCompletionMessage: Great work! You are close to achieving :goal (:percent%).
